questions: What is your field of study and why did you choose this particular program?
How does this course align with your academic and career goals?
Can you describe your previous academic achievements and qualifications?
What specific research or projects do you plan to undertake during your studies?
How do you plan to finance your studies and living expenses?
Do you have any scholarships or financial aid?
Can you provide details about your sponsors, if any?
Have you researched the cost of living in the destination country?
What are your plans after completing your studies?
How will this education benefit your home country?
Do you intend to return to your home country after graduation?
How does this program fit into your long-term career goals?
Why did you choose this particular institution?
What research have you done about the university and its facilities?
Are there similar programs available in your home country?
How does this institution's program compare to others you considered?
How do you plan to adapt to the new cultural environment?
Have you researched the local customs and traditions?
Do you have any connections or support system in the destination country?
What challenges do you anticipate and how will you overcome them?
